post.title: hancock comes to region 2 dvd december 1st 2008
post.content: i#8217;ve heard some good views on this and that#8217;s good enough for me. extended cut and theatrical version of the hancock, plus many other extras packed in this 2 disc set of the summertime box office smash hit. http://www.sphe-trade.co.uk/hancocktesco/
